txt.en: 'You there, maggot! You are needed to defend our forces in Forochel. The Free Worms are struggling a bit much for our lazy lads.\n\n'I need to you to hunt out some of the most dangerous of our enemies: the Men.'
The Free Peoples are fighting back against the invasion of the Iron Crown.
You have been instructed to defeat Men in Forochel.
Complete your slaughter before today's invasion ends
